message: Retrieving content for: You are a very good software engineer and have a p

args.query: You are a very good software engineer and have a problem with a repository that is located unter your working tree in folder workspace. There is a problem with that and you need to help me fix it. Search for all relevant files, chage those if needed and save all the changes after that in a diff.txt (the same format as the one in git for changes) file in the working tree. You are not allowed to change the tests in the project. To make it clear for you, make a plan how to tackle the problem before you start. The problem is defined in the text document problem_statement.txt in the folder. The folder path is in the problem_statement.txt.
